section.title: Determining the Size of a Mailbox
section.para: The size of a mailbox can be obtained using the cyradm utility, by issuing the command.
When using quota, the size of a mailbox hierarchy under the quota root folder can be obtained using the command.

section.title: Mailbox Folders Excempt From Quota
section.para: By creating an additional quota root, a folder's contents can be made excempt from counting towards the mailbox's quota.

example.title: Making an INBOX/Archive/ Folder Excempt from Quota

para.screen: cyradm> createmailbox user/john.doe@example.org cyradm> setquota user/john.doe@example.org 2097152 cyradm> listquotaroot user/john.doe@example.org cyradm> createmailbox user/john.doe/Archive@example.org cyradm> setquota user/john.doe/Archive@example.org cyradm> listquotaroot user/john.doe/Archive@example.org
